snippet: An island whose residents shrug off celebrities who regularly come here finally seems to feel that way about the president, too.
abstract: White House Memo; excitement for Pres Obama has faded on Martha's Vineyard over years he has vacationed there; residents, press, and businesses, especially ice cream parlors, that once banked on first family vacation visits, have grown accustomed to them; president makes fewer and fewer public appearances, spending most of his time on the golf course and private beach.
lead_paragraph: An island whose residents shrug off celebrities who regularly come here finally seems to feel that way about the president, too.

headline.print_headline: Was That an Obama on the Vineyard? Been There, Seen That
headline.main: Obama on the Vineyard? Been There, Seen That
